metadata.Title: CVE-2012-2845 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description:
Integer overflow in the jpeg_data_load_data function in jpeg-data.c in libjpeg in exif 0.6.20 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (buffer over-read and application crash) or obtain potentially sensitive information via a crafted JPEG file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-2845` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

exif - 0.6.21-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: exif package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.6.21-1').
